terms.title: Terms and Conditions
terms.text:
These terms and conditions have been drafted by a sleep-deprived student, who, through coffee and desperation, managed to put some words together in this space. Please, take note of the following:

► This is a student-oriented project. So, yes, we remind you that all of this is more for learning, although we strive to appear professional.

► The person who developed this application shed blood (and coffee) during the creation process. So, yes, that counts as part of the costs of this product.

► We, the authors, do not take responsibility if you laugh, cry, or feel puzzled while reading these terms. You decided to read them, so face the consequences!

► If for any reason you came here expecting to find a serious and formal section, we invite you to reconsider your expectations. Sarcasm and irony reign here; get ready for an unforgettable journey through the legendary Terms and Conditions section!

► Remember, no one ever reads these terms anyway, so if you made it this far, congratulations! You are part of a small, select group.


Development Team:

► Rocío "Tupodiweona" Sanhueza

Chaos and Purring Team:

► Makitara [cat1]

► Jessiecat [cat2]

► Lucia Fernanda [cat3]

Special Participation from the Stress Management Team:

► Dylanperro [SpecialDoggo]



Did you really read all of this? ╰(▔∀▔)╯
terms.reject.title: ¡Quiet@ ahí!
terms.reject.text: Debes aceptar los términos y condiciones para continuar.
